headline: Revvity and Profluent Collaborate to Launch AI-Enhanced Adenine Deaminase Pin-point Base Editing Systems
summary: WALTHAM, Mass., September 22, 2025--Revvity, Inc. (NYSE: RVTY) announced a strategic collaboration with Profluent, bringing together a range of its novel AI-engineered enzymes with Revvity’s established Pin-pointTM base editing platform. The result is simplified access for customers to a therapeutically relevant base editing toolkit.
